thread.title: Box Office: The Ghazi Attack Day 4 in overseas - Bollywood Hungama
thread.title_full: Box Office: The Ghazi Attack Day 4 in overseas - Bollywood Hungama

author: Bollywood Hungama
title: Box Office: The Ghazi Attack Day 4 in overseas - Bollywood Hungama
text:
Home » News » Box Office Special Features » Box Office: The Ghazi Attack Day 4 in overseas Box Office: The Ghazi Attack Day 4 in overseas By Bollywood Hungama News Network , Feb 21, 2017 - 9:23 pm IST 0 0 
The Ghazi Attack saw decent growth for the film on a day to day basis, which resulted in a decent weekend total. 
In this box office report we take a look at the overseas collections of The Ghazi Attack on Day 4 (Monday). 
Australia box office 3,840 USD [Rs. 2.57 lacs] from 12 screens 
U.K box office 380 USD [Rs. 25,434] from 2 screens 
U.S.A box office 48,447 USD [Rs. 32.43 lacs] from 83 screens 
Canada box office
